title: nI manam
sahitya: nI manam kanindaruLvAyE! (amba) nintAmarait tAL tozhum pEraruL seydAyE!  anupallavi  nAnmaRaigaL pORRum nAraNiyEnAn maRavEn undan nAmam tanaiyE  caraNammamakAra ahankAramenum koDum piNiyEemait tAkka vArAdaruL seyda umaiyE!sumanEsha ranjani subhAshiNI!tEmadhurat tamizh isaiyin mahimai kANa
